QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, patient_gender, patient_year_of_birth, patient_state + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value, date_service as start_date, case when date_service_end > date_service then date_service_end else date_service end as end_date, 44814724 PeriodTypeConceptId, case when place_of_service_std_id in ('13','31','32','34') then 'LTC' when place_of_service_std_id in ('21') or (revenue_code >= '0100' and revenue_code <= '0219') /* room and board charges */ or (revenue_code >= '0720' and revenue_code <= '0729') /* labor room and delivery */ or (revenue_code >= '0800' and revenue_code <= '0809') /* inpatient renal dialysis */ then 'IP' else ( case when place_of_service_std_id in ('23') or (revenue_code >= '0450' and revenue_code <= '0459') or revenue_code ='0981' or procedure_code in ('99281','99282','99283','99284','99285') then 'ER' else 'OP' end ) end as claim_type, prov_rendering_npi, diagnosis_code, case when diagnosis_priority = 1 then 44786627 else 44786629 end condition_type_concept_id, cast(diagnosis_code_qual as int) as diagnosis_code_qual, procedure_code, case when principal_proc_ind = 1 then 44786630 else 44786631 end procedure_type_concept_id, procedure_modifier_1, procedure_units_billed procedure_units FROM {sc}.medical_claims JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where logical_delete_reason is null or logical_delete_reason = '' or logical_delete_reason = 'null' )
select *, case when claim_type = 'IP' then 9201 when claim_type = 'OP' then 9202 when claim_type = 'ER' then 9203 when claim_type = 'LTC' then 42898160 end as visit_concept_id from a order by PersonId
